title: Fire at jhut warehouse in Chattogram contained
body: A fire broke out at a jhut warehouse in the Rajakhali area of Chattogram on Monday night, prompting a swift response from the Fire Service and Civil Defence. The blaze started around 10:30pm at the embankment area of Rajakhali canal and was brought under control by 11:15pm, according to sources. Abdul Mannan, deputy director of the Fire Service and Civil Defence, said four firefighting units rushed to the spot after receiving the report and managed to contain the fire after about 45 minutes. He added that the cause of the fire and the extent of damage will be determined once the investigation report is received.
